Ensuring Quality: Guardrails, Grounding, and Citations

Output Guardrails:
• Structural and syntactic checks
• Semantic and safety filters
• fewer off-topic responses

Grounding Techniques:
• Anchor in verified information
• Fact-check against knowledge base
• reduction in hallucinations

Citation Implementation:
• Link to relevant docs
• In-text section references
• increased user trust
